::Spears::

She looked at him. "OK, I'm open to suggestions. How do we make a 
replica? Use someone elses computer and put our own sofewear into it?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker sighs. "We need to build an exact replica of this, or the 
timeline 
> will change, Cybertron would be eaten by Unicron, and we'll cease 
to exist."
> 
> He looks around, frowning as he hears another panel smash into the 
floor. "An 
> exact replica would be kinda hard to make," he says, realizing that 
that was 
> an understatement.
